snippet: Icona Pop, a Swedish duo whose “I Love It” has given a hedonistic beat to TV shows, will perform at Randalls Island on Saturday in the Governors Ball music festival.
abstract: Playlist interview with Swedish duo Icona Pop, who have made name for themselves with synthy dance pop coupled with hedonistic lyrics and imagery; group is scheduled to perform at Randalls Island in Governors Ball music festival.
lead_paragraph: Icona Pop, a Swedish duo whose “I Love It” has given a hedonistic beat to TV shows, will perform at Randalls Island on Saturday in the Governors Ball music festival.

headline.seo: Icona Pop Discusses Its Tour, Including Governors Ball
headline.main: Vocal Sessions in the Car and News From Outer Space
headline.print_headline: Vocal Sessions in the Car and News From Outer Space
